text:
Hi Everyone.

So I have a question.

I'm creating modules for my drag and drop beta email "template".
(I want my client to be able to drag over the modules as he wants. This you cant do with the normal D&D template.)
In the normal D&D you can add mobile styling (style tag) within the template.

Is there anyway I can do this for the new beta D&D template?

As adding custom style tag to every module doesn't seem to play well

Please let me know if anyone can help :)
